languages.text: {n}Устрашающие шасси больше не могут удерживать гигантского воина. Лязгнув пластинами брони, он тяжело оседает. В его груди рождается низкий звук, который Толкователь {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}обращает в слова{/d}:{/n} "Горе недостойной династии Йекхмет. Исходит на нет сон, возвращается рабствование. В облачении из стыда зрю в зарницы грядущего".

{n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}turns into the words{/d},{/n} "Let woe befall the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is nearing its end and thraldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."
languages.original_text: {n}Устрашающие шасси больше не могут удерживать гигантского воина. Лязгнув пластинами брони, он тяжело оседает. В его груди рождается низкий звук, который Толкователь {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}обращает в слова{/d}:{/n} "Горе недостойной династии Йекхмет. Исходит на нет сон, возвращается рабствование. В облачении из стыда зрю в зарницы грядущего".

traits.locale_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With a clang of armour plates, his great bulk sinks down. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator turns into the words,{/n} "Woe to the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is at its end and thralldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."

languages.text: {n}La formidable armature du guerrier colossal ne parvient plus à supporter son poids. Dans le bruit métallique des plaques de son armure qui s'entrechoquent, sa grande carcasse s'effondre. De sa poitrine s'élève un son grave que votre élucidateur {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}traduit en mots{/d} :{/n} « Que la désolation s'abatte sur l'indigne dynastie Yekhmet. Le sommeil touche à sa fin et la servitude reviendra. Dans ma robe de honte, je sonde les horizons tempétueux de l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}turns into the words{/d},{/n} "Let woe befall the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is nearing its end and thraldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}La formidable armature du guerrier colossal ne parvient plus à supporter son poids. Dans le bruit métallique des plaques de son armure qui s'entrechoquent, sa grande carcasse s'effondre. De sa poitrine s'élève un son grave que votre élucidateur {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}traduit en mots{/d} :{/n} « Que la désolation s'abatte sur l'indigne dynastie Yekhmet. Le sommeil touche à sa fin et la servitude reviendra. Dans ma robe de honte, je sonde les horizons tempétueux de l'avenir. »

languages.text: {n}El formidable armazón del colosal guerrero ya no puede soportar su peso. Las placas de su armadura rechinan a medida que su gran mole se desploma. De su pecho brota un sonido grave que tu dilucidador es {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}capaz de descifrar{/d}:{/n} «Que la congoja se cierna sobre la indigna dinastía Yekhmet. El sueño se acerca a su fin y retorna la esclavitud. En mis guisas de deshonra, contemplo los tormentosos horizontes del futuro».
languages.original_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}turns into the words{/d},{/n} "Let woe befall the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is nearing its end and thraldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}El formidable armazón del colosal guerrero ya no puede soportar su peso. Las placas de su armadura rechinan a medida que su gran mole se desploma. De su pecho brota un sonido grave que tu dilucidador es capaz de descifrar:{/n} «Que la congoja se cierna sobre la indigna dinastía Yekhmet. El sueño se acerca a su fin y retorna la esclavitud. En mis guisas de deshonra, contemplo los tormentosos horizontes del futuro».

languages.text: {n}这位体格硕大的战士已经无法继续支撑沉重的身躯。伴随铠甲不断撞击的声音，他魁梧的身躯倒了下来。他的胸膛中响起了低沉的声音，你的阐释器把它{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}翻译成了这样的话{/d}。{/n}“愿灾祸降于卑鄙的叶赫迈特王朝。沉眠即将结束，奴役再次复苏。在我耻辱的祭服之中，我窥见了即将从地平线涌来的狂风暴雨。”
languages.original_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}turns into the words{/d},{/n} "Let woe befall the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is nearing its end and thraldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位体格硕大的战士已经无法继续支撑沉重的身躯。伴随铠甲不断撞击的声音，他魁梧的身躯倒了下来。他的胸膛中响起了低沉的声音，你的阐释器把它翻译成了这样的话。{/n}“愿灾祸降于卑鄙的叶赫迈特王朝。沉眠即将结束，奴役再次复苏。在我耻辱的祭服之中，我窥见了即将从地平线涌来的狂风暴雨。”
{n}这位体格硕大的战士已经无法继续支撑沉重的身躯。伴随铠甲不断撞击的声音，他魁梧的身躯倒了下来。他的胸膛中响起了低沉的声音，你的阐释器把它{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}翻译成了这样的话{/d}。{/n}“愿灾祸降于卑鄙的叶赫迈特王朝。沉眠即将结束，奴役再次复苏。在我耻辱的祭服之中，我窥见了即将从地平线涌来的狂风暴雨。”

languages.text: {n}巨大な戦士の屈強な下半身は、もはやその自重に耐えられなくなっていた。装甲板が鳴り響き、その大きな体がのけぞる。彼の胸から低い音が響き、あなたのエルシデイターが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}それを言葉に変える。{/d}{/n}「無価値なるイェクメト王朝へと災いが降りかかるであろう。眠りは終わりに近づき、王権が戻ってくる。恥辱の衣に身を包み、私は未来の荒れ狂う地平を覗き見る」
languages.original_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}turns into the words{/d},{/n} "Let woe befall the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is nearing its end and thraldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な戦士の屈強な下半身は、もはやその自重に耐えられなくなっていた。装甲板が鳴り響き、その大きな体がのけぞる。彼の胸から低い音が響き、あなたのエルシデイターが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}それを言葉に変える。{/d}{/n}「無価値なるイェクメト王朝へと災いが降りかかるであろう。眠りは終わりに近づき、王権が戻ってくる。恥辱の衣に身を包み、私は未来の荒れ狂う地平を覗き見る」

{n}巨大な戦士の屈強な下半身は、もはやその自重に耐えられなくなっていた。装甲板が鳴り響き、彼の大きな体がのけぞる。彼の胸から低い音が響く。あなたのエルシデイター、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}はそれを言葉に変える。{/d}{/n}「無価値なるイェクメト王朝へと災いが降りかかるであろう。眠りは終わりに近づき、王権が戻ってくる。恥辱の衣に身を包み、私は未来の荒れ狂う地平を覗き見るのだ」

languages.text: {n}Der formidable Unterbau des kolossalen Kriegers kann sein Gewicht nicht mehr tragen. Seine gewaltige Masse sackt mit einem lauten Knallen seiner Rüstungsplatten zusammen. Ein tiefes Geräusch wird in seiner Brust geboren. Dein Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}verwandelt es in die Worte{/d}:{/n} "Leid soll die unwürdige Dynastie Yekhmet befallen. Der Schlaf nähert sich seinem Ende, die Knechtschaft kehrt zurück. In meinem Gewand der Schande blicke ich auf den stürmischen Horizont der Zukunft."
languages.original_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. languages.text: {n}Devasa savaşçının heybetli şasisi, ağırlığını daha fazla taşıyamıyor. Zırh plakaları çınlıyor ve büyük cüssesiyle yere yığılıyor. Göğsünden derin bir ses çıkıyor, Aydınlatıcın onları {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}kelimelere dönüştürüyor{/d}.{/n} "Değersiz Yekhmet hanedanlığı keder içinde yüzsün. Uyku sona eriyor ve esaret geri dönüyor. Utancımı omzuma alıp geleceğin fırtınalı ufuklarına bakıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The colossal warrior's formidable underframe can no longer bear his weight. With armour plates clanging, his great bulk slumps. A low sound is born in his chest, which your Elucidator {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}turns into the words{/d},{/n} "Let woe befall the unworthy Yekhmet dynasty. Sleep is nearing its end and thraldom returns. In my vestment of shame, I peer into the stormy horizons of the future."
